description: The schema definition for the HPE extended properties of a memory module.

Armed.description: Specifies the current backup-ready status of the NVDIMM_N if available.

enumDescriptions.HpeSmartMemory: This DIMM is HPE Smart Memory
enumDescriptions.HpeStandardMemory: This DIMM is HPE Standard Memory
enumDescriptions.HpeLogicalNVDIMM: This DIMM is HPE Logical Memory.

BlocksRead.description: Number of blocks read for the lifetime of the Memory.

BlocksWritten.description: Number of blocks written for the lifetime of the Memory.

DIMMStatus.description: Specifies memory module status and whether the module in use.

enumDescriptions.AddedButUnused: DIMM is added but currently unused.
enumDescriptions.GoodInUse: DIMM is functioning properly and currently in use.
enumDescriptions.GoodPartiallyInUse: DIMM is functioning properly but partially in use.
enumDescriptions.Other: DIMM status that does not fit any of these definitions.
enumDescriptions.PresentSpare: DIMM is present but used as spare.
enumDescriptions.Unknown: The status of the DIMM is unknown.
enumDescriptions.UpgradedButUnused: DIMM is upgraded but currently unused.
enumDescriptions.MapOutConfiguration: DIMM mapped out due to configuration error.
enumDescriptions.MapOutError: DIMM mapped out due to training failure.

MinimumVoltageVoltsX10.description: The minimum DIMM voltage multiplied by 10, for example, 1.2v = 12.

PredictedMediaLifeLeftPercent.description: The percentage of media life left.

ProductName.description: friendly product name from SMBIOS 202 record

SpareBlockLeftPercent.description: The percentage of the number of spare blocks remaining.

items.description: The SPD Bytes in the DIMM

RelatedPhysicalDIMMs.description: An array of references to the DIMMs related to the logical NVDIMM.

RelatedBackupStores.description: An array of references to the NVMe drives related to the logical NVDIMM.

RelatedPowerBackupUnitBays.description: An array of battery backed unit bays that provides backup power to the logical NVDIMM.

MaxOperatingSpeedMTs.description: Maximum capable speed of the device, in megatransfers per second (MT/s).

title: #HpeMemoryExt.v2_3_0.HpeMemoryExt
